* In 1.0.0's development, the bottom faces of blocks had the texture mirrored - when this started and when it was fixed is unknown
* {{bug|MC-91710}} resulted in several cases of stair UV appearing different
* {{bug|MC-92137}} would also have resulted in stair UV appearing wrong
* {{bug|MC-114779}} removed a face of stairs that cannot be seen normally
